title: Aloha
lyrics: Eoduun bulbitcharae chotbul ha na wain ja ne damgin yaksuk ha na hangsang neoui gyeote seo neol jikyeojulkkeo ya nal mideojun neoyeot janha oh~ oh~ Na baraneungeon ojik ha na yeongwon han haengbogeul kkeokkeojul lae hwaryeo haji anha do kkum gatji anha do neoman isseo jumyeon dwae Geogjongma (I believe) eonje na (I believe) i sun ganeul it ji anheul kke naepume (I believe) angin neoeui misoga yeong wonhi bitcheul ilheo gaji anhge Cause your love is so sweet You are my everything cheotnal bameui dan ggume jeotjeo haneun mari a nya nan byeon haji an ha ojik neoman barabulggeo ya oh~ oh~ You're light of my life You are the one in my life nae mu deungeot da il hneun dae do huhwi haji an ha ojik neoreul wihan byeonha ji anhneun sarangeu ro Neul hanaraneun maeumeu ro heundeulli ji anh neun mideumeu ro Apeun maeumdo ham kke gi bbeun mamdo ham kke nawo ga jyeosseumyeon hae. Yaksokhae (I believe) himdeulkkae (I believe) neoui geuneri dwieojul kke naepu me (I believe) angin neoeui misoga yeong wonhi bitcheul ilheo gaji anhge Cause your love is so sweet You are my everything cheotnal bameui dan ggume jeot jeo haneun mari a nya nan byeon haji an ha ojik neoman barabulggeo ya oh~ oh~ You're light of my life You are the one in my life nae mu deungeot da il hneun dae do huhwi haji an ha ojik neoreul wihan byeonha ji anhneun sarangeu ro You're light of my life You are the one in my life nae mu deungeot da il heun dae do huhwi haji an ha ojik neoreul wihan byeonha ji anhneun sarangeu ro All I ever want is... your love
